column18: Number of whilte male inhabitants who have attained the age of 21 years
column19: Number of Male negroes above the age of 21 years
column20: Surname of employer of male negroes
column22: Prefix, Title, or Suffix of employer
column25: Horses or Mules Asses and jennies with their number
column26: Horses or Mules Asses and jennies with their value
column33: Pleasure carriages stage coaches wagons subjest to taxation Elliptic spring wagons carryalls gigs buggies and vehicles of the like kind with their number
column34: Pleasure carriages stage coaches wagons subjest to taxation Elliptic spring wagons carryalls gigs buggies and vehicles of the like kind with their  value
column39: Piano forte melodeons harps organs and musical instruments of all kinds number
column40: Piano forte melodeons harps organs and musical instruments of all kinds value
column41: The aggregate value of all household and kitchen  furniture
column42: Value of all gold and silver plate plated ware and jewelry
column43: The aggregate value of all grain tobacco and other agricultural productions
column44: The aggregate value of all ships barges boats or other watercraft with their tackling rigging furniture and all else that pertains to them
column45: Value of capital including moneys credits or other things remaining invested whether said investment was made origionallynin this or any other state or country loaned used or employed in business out of this state
column46: Value of all capital of incorporated joint stock companies not otherwise taxed
column47: Capital invested used or empolyees in any trade or business for which no license is required
column48: The aggregate amount of money and the value of the principal and interest and personal estate and credits under the control of a receiver or commissioner in pursuance of any order judgement or decree of any court
column49: The amount of any money and the value of any personal estate or credits deposited to the credit of any suit and not in the hands of a receiver
column50: Yearly rent or annual value of all toll bridges and ferries
column52: Amount of income from interest or profits received within the year next preceding the 1st of February arising from bonds or certificates of debt of the United States or of any state other than this state or country or of any county city or town other than this state or from any other bonds demands or claims due from residents in this state or any other state or country
column53: Amount of income from interest or profits which have been received or being solvent might have been received within the year next preceding the 1st of February arising from companies or corporations incorporated by  this state which do not pay taxes thereon into the treasury
column54: Amount of income from the interst or profits which have been received within the year next preceding the 1st of February arising dividends declared by the banks and companies incorporated elsewhere than by or within this state or from profits arising from business of any kind conducted out of this state whether chartered or not and whether operating exclusively within or without the same or partly within and partly without the same
column55: The net income exceeding five hundred dollars from any trade business or occupation for which a license is or was required received or realized though not received during the year next preceding the 1st of February
column56: The net income or profits exceeding five hundred dollars received or realized otherwise than under a license during the year next preceding the 1st of February arising from the use of money by such a person for his own benefit or that of another by buying and selling cattle horses or other property by the exchange of real or personal property by buying and selling or by the exchange of bonds public or private or other evidence of debt by buying and selling stocks or other choses in action and  by any other trading speculating professional occupaion or business by whatsoever means aquired or realized
column57: Fees of office accruing within the year ending the 1st of February exceeding five hundred dollars which are against the solvent persons and have been or can be received
column58: Salaries including as part of the value all other compensatons exceding one thousand dollars
column59: Amount of gross sales of oysters
column60: Total amount of state taxes on all subjects
column61: Stocks bonds evidence of debt etc on which the tax is payable by the company or corporation liable to the stock or bondholder listed herein but no tax extended thereon See secs 96 and 100 Assesment bill
column62: Number of white males above the age of 16 years
column63: Number of male negroes above the age of 16 years
column64: Amount levied on land and other property assessed with state taxes being       per cent on such taxes levied according to 53d chapter of the Code of Virginia
column65: Total levy on persons and property
